body.contents: This menu contains options for both active and ghost players.

actions.label: Claim Valid Kill
actions.tooltip: Used to claim that you've killed a player for which you should be rewarded, and the game has not properly detected it.

actions.label: Admit Bad Kill
actions.tooltip: Used to claim that you accidentally killed a player you shouldn't, and the game has not properly detected it.

actions.label: Ghost- Toggle Resistance
actions.tooltip: Applies resistance to the currently spectated player or entity

actions.label: Ghost- Toggle Weakness
actions.tooltip: Applies weakness to the currently spectated player or entity

actions.label: Ghost- Spawn Windcharge
actions.tooltip: Spawns a windcharge at your current location in the direction you are looking. Has a 5 second cooldown.

actions.label: Ghost- Spawn Notch Apple
actions.tooltip: Spawn an Enchanted Golden Apple at your current location. Has a 1 hour cooldown.

actions.label: Ghost- Fill Hunger
actions.tooltip: Fill up the hunger of whoever you are currently spectating. No Cooldown.

actions.label: Ghost- Stop Possessing
actions.tooltip: Stop spectating a player or other entity. Equivalent to typing /spectate in the command bar.
